comment.Textbox14: Includes natural gas combustion by boilers, and diesel combustion by backup power generation equipment.
Includes mobile combustion by fleet vehicles.
Includes emissions of refrigerants from building HVAC equipment.
Includes electricity purchased from the grid and purchased from third-party owned onsite fuel cells supplied by natural gas.
Includes mobile biomass combustion by fleet vehicles.
Natural gas combustion paid for by an entity other than Kaiser Permanente
Limited to work travel by air, rail and rental cars. Other Scope 3 emissions have not been quantified.

list1_SourceName.SourceName: Source Emissions | Facility Level Reporting
Source Emissions | Scope 1 off-grid solar panels owned by Kaiser Permanente 321,121 kWh of electricity usage via renewable electricity generated onsite at Kaiser Permanente facility in Oregon.
Source Emissions | Scope 2 Onsite Solar PPA with REC's Retained 15,436,121 kWh of electricity usage via onsite renewable electricity generated onsite at Kaiser Permanente facilities in California.
Source Emissions | Scope 2 Purchase of Green-e Certified REC's bundled with Energy 8,302,678 kWH of electricity usage via PGE SmartWind RECs.
Source Emissions | Scope 2 Purchase of Green-e Certified REC's Unbundled from Energy 58,836,553 kWH of electricity usage via unbundled RECs purchased from Constellation NewEnergy, Inc.
